projects.title: A Skincare app
projects.description: Understand your skin. The app allows users to track what they eat, when they have breakouts, and give personalized skincare recommendations.

projects.title: Birb Service ( ')>
projects.description: A gRPC service built with Vert.x, designed to get birb information. Deployed on fly.io. Currently suspended because it's charging me for ram. Btw, I created the poster using AI bing.com/create. (wink, I'm trendy)
